body.name: MEDIHEAL Madecassoside Cotton Facial Pads - Toner Pads with Centella Asiatica to Improve Uneven Skin Tone - Vegan Face Gauze Pads, 100 Pads
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 24 mins
features: SQUARE PADS FOR DAY & NIGHT CARE: Mediheal soothing cotton face pads are ideal day and night daily toner pads that offer a quick skin fix. These pads are made with vegan fibers with rounded corners to ensure a perfect fit and come with a pair of long, skinny tweezers, keeping the face pads dirt-free.

ENRICHED WITH NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Mediheal Madecassoside Blemish Pad contains Centella Asiatica extracted 2 times with micro-particle Madecassoside to calms and help reduce blemishes and dark spots on uneven, post-acne skin. It helps keep your skin soft, hydrated, and nourished.

ANTI-BLEMISH AND SPOT CLEARING: These cleansing facial pads help improve melanin production to reduce the appearance of uneven tone and dark spots. Our anti-blemish face pads are formulated to maximize the toning effect resulting in improved skin tone, texture, and complexion while reducing roughness.

HYPOALLERGENIC PADS FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Mediheal square cotton pads for face are made with 100% plant-derived ingredients and vegan fibers with no artificial colors or fragrances. These cotton pads are developed by professionals and suit all skin types, including sensitive and acne-prone skin.

HOW TO USE: After cleansing, apply on any areas (forehead, cheeks, and chin) for quick and easy intensive skin care. Leave on the skin like a sheet mask! You can also use the pads as a face mask. After using the pads as a sheet mask, gently wipe across the skin to tone, moisturize, and prep the skin.
body.description: Product Description POST BLEMISH CARE Madecassoside Blemish Pad is a toner pad that calms and helps reduce the appearance of blemishes and dark spots on uneven, post-acne skin. Ideal for daily use, our lint-free pads with Madecassoside are formulated to maximize the toning effect resulting in improved skin tone, texture, and complexion while reducing roughness. Proven to help improve the appearance of uneven skin tone and dark spots by 16% in four weeks Instantly helps improve rough skin texture by 19% Instantly helps soothe irritated skin

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Day & Night Daily Toner Pads for Quick Skin Fix! A simple yet efficient routine to pamper your skin in a busy schedule! Four types of toner pads provide the beauty solution right for your skin types and concerns.

Key Ingredients: MADECASSOSIDE in 2X amounts created through 2-time extraction of Centella Asiatica, which improves melanin production to reduce the appearance of uneven tone and dark spots. Madecassoside is broken down into small particles to quickly and intensively quench irritated skin. Recommended to those who want: - Quick and easy daily blemish care - Mild exfoliation for rough skin - Non-sticky, moisturizing product Product Description POST BLEMISH CARE Madecassoside Blemish Pad is a toner pad that calms and helps reduce the appearance of blemishes and dark spots on uneven, post-acne skin. Ideal for daily use, our lint-free pads with Madecassoside are formulated to maximize the toning effect resulting in improved skin tone, texture, and complexion while reducing roughness. Proven to help improve the appearance of uneven skin tone and dark spots by 16% in four weeks Instantly helps improve rough skin texture by 19% Instantly helps soothe irritated skin

Safe for Sensitive Skin Our hypoallergenic toner pad passed 24-hour primary skin irritation patch tests with the Skin Reaction Score of 0.00. Made with 100% plant-derived ingredients and vegan fibers, it is gentle and safe for all skin types including sensitive and acne-prone skin.

Packaging & Pads Made with vegan fiber - The vegan-certified gauze fabric holds soothing essence and provides gentle care. - It adds mild exfoliation to your skincare regime. Hygienic tweezers - A pair of long, skinny tweezers included : Hygienic tweezers keep all 100 pads free from external contaminants. Generous size pad with rounded corners - Generous size (67mm) to cover a wide area on the face - Rounded corners for the perfect application

How to Use 1. As a treatment pad: after cleansing, gently swipe across the skin to tone, moisturize, and prep the skin. 2. As a treatment mask: apply on targeted areas (forehead, cheeks, and chin) after cleansing for an intensive treatment. Leave on for 15 minutes, remove and let the remaining serum absorb into the skin. - Can be used daily both in the AM and PM.

Teatree Trouble Pad Madecassoside Blemish Pad Watermide Toner Pad Collagen Ampoule Pad Phyto-Enzyme Peeling Pad Vitamide Brightening Pad Skin Benefits Calms & balances acne-prone, sensitive skin Post Blemish Care – reduce blemishes and dark spots on uneven, post-acne skin Hydrates & cools dry, puffy, coarse skin Nourishes & firms aging, saggy skin with wrinkles and lines Pore-tightening, Exfoliating Brighten & Clarify skin Key Ingredients Tea Tree, Lactobacillus Centella Asiatica, Madecassoside Woodland Forget-me-not Flowers, Icelandic Glacial Water Collagen, Ceramide, Milk Protein Papaya Enzyme, LHA Niacinamide, Essential Vitamin Pads Gauze Pads Gauze Pads Micro Perforated ‘Eco Silk’ Pads Micro Perforated ‘Eco Silk’ Pads Fine Embossed Fabric Pads 100% Plant-derived Cotton Pads Vegan-certified Fiber ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Tested for Sensitive Skin ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don't usually write reviews on Amazon but for the Mediheal Pads I had to go out of my way! The scent is so luxurious and it makes my skin feel fresh and renewed. It's definitely worth the hype!! I want to try all the others in the line now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars moisturizing and little scent
reviews.reviewText: Product is nice and cooling! My skin always looks refreshed and plump after use!

reviews.reviewerName: Got rid of my textured skin!!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Got rid of my textured skin !
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this toner ! I have dry skin, no acne but with texture that I could not get rid of for the life of me. I was using the anua toner pads, which were amazing, but I disliked that there wasn't a refill option and it didn't fully get rid of my texture. So I bought the MEDIHEAL Phyto Enzyme Peeling Pad and it got rid of my texture in the first few days I started using it. Its hydrating and makes my skin so soft and smooth. Theres not even a HINT of texture. I took one star off because the fragrance is so strong. It was almost to strong to the point where I thought about returning it and going back to anua. But the results are just too good to return this toner and I'm so happy with my skin right now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Believe the hype!!!
reviews.reviewText: I believe this product single-handedly changed the texture of my skin and it was within a week I saw visible change! No exaggeration. I love it sooo much till I am putting it on auto order and praying the formula doesn’t change. I’m an oily girl with large pores around my tzone especially my nose/cheek area. Never been acne prone so I can’t speak to that. I was shook when my skin started giving a lil glass skin and this product was the only thing I changed in my routine. I added tretinoin recently and WOWWWWWZZZAAAA!!! Those 2 products together gives glass skin!! I’m ecstatic!! Believe the hype and just know it doesn’t work unless you do aka be consistent! I was using it consistently for 1 week day & night and I could seriously tell a difference. A true noticeable difference that made me ask what’s in here?! Also I’m a sensitive skin girly to the point where I always have to get a skin calming treatment after facials because my skin freaks out EVERY TIME 🤦🏽‍♀️ IYKYK and I haven’t had any issues with this product turning my skin red or any type of reaction to it and I definitely did a patch test first causeee yeahhh! So I recommend you do the same! No burning or irritating.. it’s very refreshing and the pads are very thin but juicy and contains more than enough product for full face + neck each use. I’ve been using this since October and I still have plenty left & today I just found out they have refills for this!! A win is a WIN lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I saw this facial pad being advertised on tiktok and the girl had the same bumps on her face as me so I decided to try it out. My face had gotten super dry and flaky in the summer due to trying out a toner that didn't fit my skin type. I had to keep exfoliating my face to take off the dead skin from the dryness. I started my first pack in August and just finished it. After the first few uses, I noticed how soft, refreshed and hydrated my face felt. It has minimized my pores and goosebump-like bumps on my face. Very happy with my results so far.

reviews.reviewerName: I thought this was a good idea but it is 1. A bit difficult to stick to the couch without sticking it to yourself and 2. My cat pulled it right off.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m glad I tried this
reviews.reviewText: I’ve seen these toner pads advertised all over social media and I can see why! They’re honestly amazing. I have sensitive and acne prone skin so it’s difficult to find a toner that won’t eat at my skin. This is so easy to use, so gentle on my skin, and it smells very nice. It comes with little tongs you can use to carefully take one pad at a time and then you gently run it over your skin. You can feel it moisturizing and doing it’s job. It feels nice and it leaves my skin looking and feeling nice. I do still moisturize once it’s dried a bit and my skin is doing amazing. It’s been about a week of use for me and I already know I’m going to stock up on more. I also love how much of the product you get for the price.Mediheal has always been a brand I’ve loved and I’ve used their face masks in the past. They’re a great brand that really tailors to their customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Results after using 2 times
reviews.reviewText: I’m so impressed. I used the madecassoside first as a sheet mask for about 10 mins. Within a few hours a lot of the texture I had started turning into small white bumps. The next day they were all healed and my skin looked much smoother. I used them again the next day just sweeping across the face for about a minute. Again a few little bumps surfaced and were gone by the end of the day. This is the first product I’ve used where I see immediate results and I can honestly say NOTHING has ever calmed the redness in my skin except these. 10000% recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Unsure about these…
reviews.reviewText: So I got these in hopes of fixing some texture and, my pore size and I was told these were great. First thing I noticed is the strong smell which I can only describe as a spice smell of some sort. I did love it but I kept an open mind since no review said anything about the smell. I have only been using them for a week and I do notice small improvements in my pore size. But I also notice a serum like feel on my skin that doesn’t really dry down and small bumps on my skin mainly on my chin and forehead, which are not a problem area for me. I don’t want to fix my pores to have a new issue to fix! I’m not sure if anyone else has had this problem, my skin isn’t reacting well to it or I got a bad box? If anyone could help that would be great or other recommendations!
Super soft pads, gentle lotion, no sent and easy to use.
It's been a month since I bought it and I've seen a better skin , more even on texture and blemishes it has also help control with my oily t zone
Amazing product! I use it most of the time on my night skincare routine and I recommend it 100%
Help get away my blemish’s and clears my skin

I really love this product! After one use, you can definitely see a change! My skin was hydrated and glowing. It’s perfect for dry skin even oily skin. I’m combination skin, but in winter my face is very dry. Also, I really enjoy the cool effect of these pads. I would definitely repurchase again! Sadly, they don’t sell the refill for this pad on Amazon.
